attributes.action: use any diplomatic powers at the British Government’s disposal to reduce the threat of either America or Israel starting a war against Iran
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently there seems to be a lot of threatening noises coming out of Washington, probably as a way of distracting people from the current disasters in Iraq and Afghanistan. I am seeking reassurance that this Government will not allow the UK to be dragged sheep-like into yet another USA led conflict and also that the UK government will do all that is in its powers to prevent the USA embarking on such a senseless course of action.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
